tool.name: Scanpy FindMarkers
tool.description: to find differentially expressed genes between groups
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-find-markers #if $output_markers --save output.csv #end if --n-genes '${n_genes}' --groupby '${groupby}' #if $settings.default == "false" --method '${settings.method}' ${settings.use_raw} ${settings.rankby_abs} #if $settings.groups --groups '${settings.groups}' #end if --reference '${settings.reference}' --filter-params 'min_in_group_fraction:${settings.min_in_group_fraction},max_out_group_fraction:${settings.max_out_group_fraction},min_fold_change:${settings.min_fold_change}' #end if @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@

param.name: output_markers
param.label: Output markers table in csv format

param.name: n_genes
param.label: Number of top genes to show per group/cluster

param.name: method
param.label: Method for testing differentially expressed genes
param.option: wilcoxon test, currently broken don't use

param.name: rankby_abs
param.label: Rank by absolute value of the scores instead of the scores

param.name: groups
param.label: Subset of groups/clusters to which comparisons shell be restricted.

param.name: reference
param.label: If 'rest', compare to the union of the rest of the group/cluster. If a group identifier, compare to that group

param.name: min_in_group_fraction
param.label: Minimum in-group fraction
param.help: Post-test filtering to only keep genes expressed in at least this fraction of cells in the test group.

param.name: max_out_group_fraction
param.label: Maximum out-group fraction
param.help: Post-test filtering to only keep genes expressed in at most this fraction of cells in the reference group.

param.name: min_fold_change
param.label: Minimum fold change
param.help: Post-test filtering to only keep genes with at least this fold change of expression relative to the reference group.
